## Available algorithms to be used in caretSDM

```{r}
#Teste de algoritmos para o Salminus:
algo <- c(
  # SVM
  "svmLinear", "svmLinear2","svmLinearWeights", "svmRadialWeights", "svmPoly", "svmRadial",
  "svmRadialCost", "svmRadialSigma","lssvmRadial",
  # Discriminant
  "bagFDA","fda", "hda", "hdda", "lda", "lda2", "loclda", "mda", "pda", "pda2", "qda", "rda",
  "Linda", "rmda", "sda","sparseLDA", "slda", "smda", "bagFDAGCV", "dwdLinear", "dwdRadial", "Mlda",
  "sdwd",
  # Neural Networks
  "nnet", "avNNet", "monmlp", "pcaNNet", "dnn", "mlp", "mlpML", "mlpWeightDecay", "mlpWeightDecayML",
  "rbf", "rbfDDA",
  # Neighbors
  "kknn", "knn", "ownn", "snn", "pam",
  # Naive Bayes
  "naive_bayes","nb",
  # Tree-based
  "ada", "AdaBag","AdaBoost.M1", "blackboost", "bstTree", "C5.0", "C5.0Cost", "C5.0Tree", "ctree",
  "ctree2", "evtree", "gbm", "J48", "LogitBoost",  "rotationForest","rotationForestCp", "rpart",
  "rpart1SE", "rpart2", "rpartCost", "rpartScore", "treebag", "xgbDART","xgbTree","cforest", "LMT",
  "parRF", "ranger", "Rborist", "rf", "RRF", "RRFglobal","wsrf",
  # Regression
  "bagEarth", "bagEarthGCV", "bam", "bayesglm", "earth", "gam", "gamboost", "gamLoess", "gamSpline",
  "gaussprRadial", "gcvEarth", "glm", "glmboost","glmnet", "glmStepAIC", "gpls","kernelpls",
  "multinom", "plr", "pls","plsRglm", "regLogistic", "simpls", "spls", "vglmAdjCat", "vglmContRatio",
  "vglmCumulative", "widekernelpls",
  # Others
  "null", "JRip", "msaenet", "OneR", "PART", "PRIM", "xgbLinear"
  )

algo <- c(
  # SVM
  "svmRadial",
  # Discriminant
  "fda", "mda",
  # Neural Networks
  "nnet", "mlp", "rbf",
  # Neighbors
  "knn",
  # Naive Bayes
  "naive_bayes",
  # Tree-based
  "rf", "ctree","gbm",  "rpart",
  # Regression
  "earth", "glm"
  )
```
